attributes.action: Keep restrictions work from home, social distance inside and face masks.
attributes.additional_details: Keep the work from home policy for workers in offices as they’re very dirty and breed too many germs. Working in an enclosed office or call centre with no windows that open means everyone catches everyone else’s germs especially when you don’t get your own desk and have to hot desk. Indoors we should still have social distance  measures indoors and also face masks in enclosed areas.
